data.title: Fujitsu Asia Pacific on LinkedIn: As part of our Strategic Community Investment program, our team at Fujitsu…
data.meta_description: As part of our Strategic Community Investment program, our team at Fujitsu Vietnam and Project LoHi recently visited two local disadvantaged families in Yen…
data.text:
Fujitsu has shared some ideas for how we're championing diversity and inclusion to foster greater collaboration 💡 Our CEO Graeme Beardsell participated in a panel session at the Carlton IN Business diversity and inclusion luncheon, where we were also an event sponsor 🙌 He discussed Fujitsu's journey towards being an employer of choice, and ways we’re fostering a diverse and inclusive workplace at Fujitsu 💬 Our Acting Head of Purpose for ANZ Charlotte Wright delivered a keynote speech highlighting our commitment to First Nations partnerships and reconciliation, and shared insights into our award-winning Cherbourg Service Centre. This centre helps boost the economic development of Queensland First Nations communities through digital skills training and employment opportunities. Discover how Fujitsu is promoting diversity and inclusion to drive meaningful change 👉 https://okt.to/pYFNn0 #Diversity #Inclusion #Purpose

Customer spotlight: Accelerating growth with data automation for WineWorks🍷 WineWorks bottles up to 65,000 cases of wine every day. They faced challenges in automating processes as they were relying on operational data scattered across the organisation. In 6 weeks, Fujitsu created a unified end-to-end data platform to accelerate the firm's automation plan. The results? 🍾 Real-time data collection to quickly address bottling line errors 📈 Accelerated growth with enhanced efficiency and data-driven decision-making 👩💻 Improved capabilities and confidence of IT team in data technologies Learn from this customer story 👉 https://okt.to/b5WmlN #DataAutomation #BusinessEfficiency #CustomerStory

In the film “I, Robot,” Detective Spooner challenges the robot Sonny on the essence of humanity – creativity. Can AI truly match or even exceed human creativity? 🤔 At Fujitsu, we believe humans can use AI to achieve a better future. Our CEO Graeme Beardsell shares his insights into how we can embrace the collaboration between humans and machines to herald a new era of innovation and progress Read more 👉 https://okt.to/u3rYvC #AI #Technology #DigitalInnovation

+85% of leaders in Asia Pacific are not seeing tangible results from their sustainability initiatives. How are your sustainability initiatives tracking? 🌏 📋 Fujitsu's latest survey with Financial Times has revealed the state of sustainability in Asia Pacific and beyond. Watch the video below and download the report for all the key findings 👉 https://okt.to/gsyazJ #SustainabilityTransformation #FujitsuSXSurvey

The results are in 📋 38% of you told us that your hybrid cloud priority is in securing infrastructure, and 24% of you are focusing on improving cloud performance. Now is the time to focus on long-term strategies to build resilience, nurture creativity, and enhance operational efficiency. Want to avoid common cloud mistakes and gain expert recommendations to future-proof your cloud transformation roadmap? 📄 Download our expert paper to find out more 👉 https://okt.to/CTk5VL

Ready to unlock the power of secure AI for your business? 🚀 Fujitsu is partnering with Cohere to bring you cutting-edge generative AI solutions designed specifically for private cloud environments. Imagine: ✔️ Boosting your productivity with AI-powered automation, all within a secure private cloud environment. ✔️ Enhancing customer experiences with personalised interactions in Japanese, tailored to your specific industry needs. ✔️ Gaining a competitive edge with advanced AI capabilities, designed for sensitive data. This partnership will give you the tools you need to succeed in today's data-driven world, while ensuring the highest levels of security and privacy. Stay tuned for more updates on this exciting collaboration. Read more here: https://lnkd.in/g5eSntBa #GenerativeAI #PrivateCloud #EnterpriseAI

A state-of-the-art quantum research facility is coming to Australia 🚀 The Australian National University has teamed up with Fujitsu to advance world-class quantum computing in Australia 🙌 To drive local innovation and talent development, this collaboration will see: ✅ Fujitsu providing ANU researchers and academics with access to Fujitsu’s quantum systems in Japan ✅ An establishment of an on-site quantum computer at ANU ✅ ANU develop teaching and training modules based on Fujitsu’s quantum technologies Read the full story on InnovationAus.com 👉 https://okt.to/VOz9Lo #DigitalTransformation #QuantumComputing #Technology

Applications welcome: quantum simulator challenge 🙌 We’re extending the deadline to Saturday 20 July for the Fujitsu Quantum Simulator Challenge 📅 US$100,000 in prizes is up for grabs. Don’t miss your chance to ✅ Gain free access to an advanced quantum simulator ✅ Collaborate with Fujitsu’s quantum experts ✅ Potential future partnerships and investment opportunities And more! Want to test Fujitsu’s advanced quantum simulator on complex business challenges and applications? Find out more 👉 https://okt.to/CqNmV0 #QuantumComputing #QuantumSimulator #QuantumComputing

3/5 Asia Pacific businesses are considering/implementing hybrid cloud ☁️Yet many struggle to scale/optimise their hybrid cloud environments. Curious about how your industry or country stacks up for maximising the value of hybrid clouds? 🤔 From cost optimisation to cloud reliability and resilience, the IDC Asia Pacific Guide provides tailored insights to help guide your cloud journey. Download the guide today 👉 https://okt.to/8maVdh

“As quantum computing advances, so does the urgency to protect our digital infrastructure.” 💬 What can organisations do to embrace quantum’s potential while safeguarding your data? 🔐 Fujitsu APAC CEO Graeme Beardsell describes the double-edged sword that is quantum. Read the opinion piece originally published in Cyber Daily to find out how you can stay ahead in today’s race for quantum-resistant encryption 👉 https://okt.to/geUwil #QuantumComputing #CyberSecurity #Encryption
